purpose: Highlight closed system learning from trusted UK clinical resources - not Google, but NICE and the Green Book. Safety through quality sources.
core_message: It's not learning from Google. In the UK, we use NICE. We use the Green Book. A closed system, fed only with the right clinical information.
summary: Single image positioning closed system and trusted UK clinical resources as safety foundation. Emphasizes learning from NICE and Green Book, not Google. Addresses trust concern subtly by highlighting rigorous clinical foundation. Creates curiosity about safety and quality sources.
